original_title: WUK?! Een virtual reality ervaring in het Algemeen Beschaafd West-Vlaams
overview: Meet the West-Flemish pub goers in Café 't Hoekske, but don’t stare too long at them, because they might get aggressive... The West Flemish Pub Experience is an interactive VR experience that takes you to a cozy virtual pub like theone on every corner of the West Flemish countryside. A virtual view into an animated world.
title: The West Flemish Pub Experience
